attributes.action: Cancel future sporting events to prevent the imminent effect of the Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Mass gatherings of all forms should be prevented by government measures and what a great way to lead by example by protecting everyone who attends sporting events. What a small price to pay for everyones futures. It's a small thing in the big scheme of things. We need to act now.
attributes.background: Cancel large sporting events until future notice. Ensure the safety of the people who love sports of all kinds by being firm and preventing the spread of this deadly virus any further.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
